titleStmt.title: The third and last booke of songs or aires Newly composed to sing to the lute, orpharion, or viols, and a dialogue for a base and meane lute with fiue voices to sing thereto. By Iohn Dowland, Bacheler in Musicke, and lutenist to the most high and mightie Christian the fourth by the grace of God king of Denmark and Norwey, &c.
Songs or ayres, 3rd book
titleStmt.author: Dowland, John, 1563?-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: By P. S[hort] for Thomas Adams, and are to be sold at the signe of the white Lion in Paules Churchyard, by the assignement of a patent granted to T. Morley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: a patent granted to T. Morley

place.placeName: the signe of the white Lion in Paules Churchyard
